columns.Description: Date and time when the record was generated
columns.Name: Timestamp

columns.Description: Type of threat indicator or breach activity identified by the behavior
columns.Name: Categories

columns.Description: MITRE ATT&CK techniques associated with the activity that triggered the behavior
columns.Name: AttackTechniques

columns.Description: Product or service that identified the behavior
columns.Name: ServiceSource

columns.Description: Detection technology or sensor that identified the notable component or activity
columns.Name: DetectionSource

columns.Description: Products or services that provided information for the behavior
columns.Name: DataSources

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the device in the service
columns.Name: DeviceId

columns.Description: User principal name (UPN) of the account
columns.Name: AccountUpn

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the account in Microsoft Entra ID
columns.Name: AccountObjectId

columns.Description: Date and time of the first activity related to the behavior
columns.Name: StartTime

columns.Description: Date and time of the last activity related to the behavior
columns.Name: EndTime
